texasholdem

Class Card

  • java.lang.Object
    • texasholdem.Card

  • public class Card
extends java.lang.Object
    Each Card object represents a playing card from a standard card deck. Each card has a suit represented by the suit and a value represented by the number.
    Author:
    John Wardell

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Card()
      A no argument constructor
      Card(Suit suit, Number number)
      Constructs Card with supplied suit and value.

      Compares card values.

      Checks for equality
      Number getNumber()
      Gets this card's number (value)
      Suit getSuit()
      Gets this card's suit.
      boolean isNumNext(Card otherCard)
      Returns true if the value of otherCard directly follows this card.
      boolean isSameNum(Card otherCard)
      Returns true if the cards have the same value, unless they are the same exact card.
      boolean isSameSuit(Card otherCard)
      Returns true if the suit of otherCard matches this card, unless they are the exact same card.
      static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
      The main method is for testing purposes only.

      • isNumNext

        public boolean isNumNext(Card otherCard)
        Returns true if the value of otherCard directly follows this card. In case of ace to two, this method returns false.
        Parameters:
        otherCard - the other Card
